name: GeordieSlang&Phrases
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: As part of your daily Flash Briefing this skill will teach you a new slang word or phrase specific to "Geordies" the residents of Newcastle, England. Each day you will receive a new word or phrase, it's definition, and use case. It will be a fun and interesting addition to your daily routine or as a Geordie would say, "It's canny good, like!".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
